question: "NGMA KE SANGRAH SE", a programme that was seen in news recently, is associated with which field?
explanation:
National Gallery of Modern Art, New Delhi launched a virtual program, named “NGMA KE SANGRAH SE", to showcase its artworks.
The prestigious and rare collection of artworks at the National Gallery of Modern Art, New Delhi will be showcased through the virtual program. This program is based on various themes and the theme for this week is ‘ARTIST BY ARTISTS’ and dedicated to Rabindranath Tagore. The 159th birth anniversary of Tagore falls on May 7, 2020.
